mil6.3.12:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil6.3.12:0.4_0: and hold of quenching with nothing left over.
mil6.3.12:1.1_0: “Is there any Nāgadatta that place where there is the eastern quarter, or to the west, the north, or south, up above, below, and extinguishment?”
mil6.3.12:1.2_0: “Great king, there’s no place or west, north, or south from the east, west, north, or south, up above, below, and extinguishment.”
mil6.3.12:10.1_0: In this chapter there are twelfth.
mil6.3.12:2.1_0: “Sir, for one who hasn’t seen extinguishment, but is bigger than that.
mil6.3.12:2.2_0: But those who have realized extinguishment by the wrong way for the sake of realizing this the wrong path.
mil6.3.12:2.3_0: It would be more fruitful to feed one tree than that.
mil6.3.12:2.4_0: In the same way, if extinguishment is whether there is something left over or not, but also because it’s hard to get up. But I don’t see extinguishment ...
mil6.3.12:3.1_0: “Great king, there is no matter how to properly attend to extinguishment, which is pointed out.

mil6.3.12:4.4_0: And they don’t have the gems around both precious things.

mil6.3.12:5.1_0: “A is there a big trap of extinguishment, which is the right size, where that is practicing well?”
mil6.3.12:5.2_0: “Ask there is such a thing, great king, practicing rightly.”
mil6.3.12:6.2_0: “Great king, those who properly attend properly on by virtue of ethics, still less when they are able to focus on the instructions of the Buddhas, or in the future, or present, where they never realize extinguishment.
mil6.3.12:6.3_0: Even though a man with good eyesight were standing in the woods of the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind. They even see the blade of drill-stick made from a wind, or the fairy, and the chopped off their heads.
mil6.3.12:6.4_0: In the same way, grounded on ethics, learning, generosity, and wisdom.
mil6.3.12:7.2_0: Wherever there is standing in the past,
mil6.3.12:7.3_0: In the same way, properly attend to someone in the forest ...
mil6.3.12:7.4_0: Wherever there is right, one whose stream is cut off, one whose shoes are cut off, and one whose shoes are extinguished.”
mil6.3.12:7.5_0: “Sir, it’s good that you’ve taught the explanation of extinguishment by your ethical conduct, which is properly implemented, relied on the side, and reproaching to the Dhamma, the topics to quenching, the sage digotten, and tortured him; that is,
